channel.title: Problem with nullers
channel.description: Ok on our server (well my mates) we are having a massive problem with nullers ....like 50-60% of players are nulls ...and i dont know how to fix it..any suggestions? btw he wont use ham anymore because he got hacked last time he used it (on real rs)

item.title: Problem with nullers
item.dc:creator: @bardong bardong
item.description:
@bardong wrote:

We have already done that a while ago…still gettiing shit loads of nulls

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with nullers
item.dc:creator: @mod1 mod
item.description:
@mod1 wrote:

ok here what u need is this

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and paste

Server Base: All

Classes Modified: Client

Procedure
Step 1: look for your run() method in your client.java,
find this

if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { disconnected = true; return; }

Once you find that replace wit this:

if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.players[playerId] = null; return; }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 09:46:10 AM[/size][hr]that gets rid of ur nulls-credits to silbasoft

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with nullers
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

ham cant be used to hack someones noob acount of runescape,however using the same name and pass like in real rs2 on a server does,also giving your pass to anyone even ure best friend can couse things like that,use silab’s anti null tut to fix the other problem

Read full topic
